1.title: Addicted to Hacks
1.plot: Kevin and Brooke are having dinner in a hot tub... yup, it's exactly what you think. And it's a blast from the past as Kevin re-hacks a self-tanner. Plus, in the new Saved by the Hacks, our teens have let the hacks take over.

2.title: Hack and Cheese
2.plot: Brooke and Kevin learn ways to game the system with parking, and the Lazy Cook returns with a recipe for bringing old mac and cheese back to life. Plus, Senora is not the portrait of good behavior in a new Hacks Del Corazon.

5.title: Solar-powered hacks
5.plot: Kevin and Brooke use the power of the sun to hack a juicy burger. Then, Brooke has some hacks to keep leftover wine from going to waste, and Kevin learns how to wrap a bicycle with our gift-wrapping Hack Master.

6.plot:

8.title: Hacks by the Poolside
8.plot: Brooke and Kevin go head-to-head testing out hacks to make your pool party the event of the year. Then, they put a bug-saving hack to the test, and Kevin steps into a wrestling ring to learn some confidence-boosting hacks.

10.title: Reverse Hackology

1.title: The World of Hacks
1.plot: Brooke and Kevin put their hacking skills to the test as they find out which hacks work best for removing pet hair, grilling without charcoal, and opening a wine bottle without a bottle opener. Plus, they'll uncover the best pool party hacks, and craft a hack-filled defense against the rugged outdoorsman.

2.title: Slacker vs. Hacker
2.plot: Brooke and Kevin determine which hacks work best for combatting spicy foods, peeling potatoes, camping, and keeping the mirror from fogging up after a shower. Plus, they'll see if a fork made from a pencil really does the trick.

3.title: An Explosion of Hacks
3.plot: Brooke and Kevin find out which hacks work best for shining shoes, avoiding soda can explosions, putting wine in a blender, and housekeeping. Plus, they'll teach you hacks that will help combat any party animal.

4.title: Peeling Back the Hacks
4.plot: Brooke and Kevin compete to discover the best hacks for chopping a watermelon, removing stickers from a locker. Plus, they'll prepare you for your next tailgate and for any encounter with a walking disaster.

5.title: Undercover Hacks
5.plot: Brooke and Kevin go undercover as they find out which hacks work best for opening a beer bottle. Plus, they discover new hacks for cleaning, throwing a great party, and using a ballpoint pen in ways you'd never imagine.

6.title: Hack the Unexpected
6.plot: Brooke and Kevin put their hacking skills to the test as they find out which hacks work best for popping popcorn and polishing silverware. Plus, they'll uncover the best hacks for working out and using dental floss.

7.title: Cookin' Up Some Hacks
7.plot: Brooke and Kevin take hacking to the next level as they uncover the best hacks for cooking pizza and cutting cake. Plus, they'll show why bread is a true All-Star, and teach you some hacks that every parent needs to know.

8.title: Lost and Found Hacks
8.plot: Our hosts find hacks for retrieving lost objects, separating egg yolks, and removing wallpaper stains. They'll also make duct tape an All-Star, find another use for walnuts, and show you how to hack your home while you're away.

9.title: Swimming in Hacks
9.plot: Brooke and Kevin swim in the back of a truck, cook steak in a bag, and turn bike parts into a clock. Plus, they add coffee filters to the All-Star club, uncover road trip tips, and craft hacks to defend against your sick spouse.

10.title: Hack or Wack
10.plot: Brooke and Kevin uncover the difference between a hack and a wack, as they use an onion for cleaning and beer for moisturizer. Plus, they show you the real way to hack your hotel breakfast, and how to defend against your needy neighbor.

1.title: Hackers Back in Action
1.plot: Brooke and Kevin cook lasagna in a dishwasher, go back in time to discover some of history's earliest hacks, and learn how to hack breakfast using power tools.

2.title: Dr. Hack to the Rescue
2.plot: Brooke and Kevin take hacking to the streets, as they enlist the public to find out whether an electrocuted hot dog is hack or wack. Plus, they'll referee the ultimate couch race using the best hacks for moving furniture, welcome a pair of old socks to the all-star club, and learn how a bra is actually a hack from history. But watch out! There's a new doctor in town on this episode of Hack My Life with his own hacks to save the day.

3.title: Lend Me a Hack
3.plot: Our dynamic duo discovers how to hack vodka to taste like top shelf, explores the origin of gin and tonic with Hacks from History, and welcomes a tennis ball into the exclusive All Star club.

4.title: Battle of the Bags
4.plot: Battle of the Bags: Kevin and Brooke host the ultimate Battle of the Bags, as they discover the best hacks for carrying groceries. Plus, they'll get tips from the newest Hack Hero, learn how to get a great workout without ever leaving the office, welcome a rubber glove into the All Star Club, and explore hacks from history with the original Hack Master: Benjamin Franklin.

5.title: Hacking the Brain
5.plot: Kevin and Brooke search for the ultimate lipstick hack, explore beeswax as a waterproofing technique, and welcome an old tire into the All-Star Club. Plus, this week's "Hack Master" will go to the extreme by hacking Kevin's brain.

6.title: Beard-Off
6.plot: Kevin and Brooke put the best shaving hacks to the test in the ultimate beard-off, and find out if using a drill to eat corn is hack or wack. Plus, they'll welcome toothpaste into the All-Star Club and use pencil lead to make a light bulb.

7.title: Hacking Your Golden Years
7.plot: Explore hacks for all ages, from staying clean while eating ribs, to staying young in your golden years. Plus, watch hacks for making soap and hanging shelves, and get ready to welcome the twist tie to the All Star Club.

8.title: The Hack Super Villain
8.plot: Brooke and Kevin discover the best hacks for stretching out shoes and removing coffee stains. Plus, they'll welcome hangers into the All Star Club, explore the most delicious hack from history, and meet the newest Hack Hero.

9.title: Graphite Man
9.plot: Brooke and Kevin learn how to get zippers unstuck with the help of Graphite Man, and find out if a lawnmower made out of a bike is hack or wack. Plus, they'll test the best hacks for brushing your teeth when you forget your toothbrush.

10.title: The Hacks of LIfe
10.plot: Learn how to get gum out of your hair and how to survive a zombie apocalypse. Plus, welcome a broomstick to the All Star Club, find out the real way to remove permanent marker, and discover a new Hack from History: the lawnmower.

11.title: Hacks for Work and Play
11.plot: Brooke and Kevin discover the best - and most unconventional - ways to inflate a basketball with the help of some professional players, explore the birth of the fanny pack in Hacks from History, and end up with an explosion on their hands from just a piece of fruit. Plus, Pitchman uncovers the best ways to unclog drains, pit cherries, and grate cheese, all with items you already own.

12.title: The Next Level of Hacking
12.plot: Hack My Life is back to take hacking to the next level! Brooke and Kevin explore hacks for getting special treatment at a restaurant, and Broke Ass Bob finds hacks to save you money. Plus, become your very own sushi chef.

13.title: Hack the Home and Beyond
13.plot: Brooke and Kevin reveal the ultimate hands-free mower, find hacks for carpet stains, hack a chandelier and learn from pros Becky and Broke Ass Bob.

14.title: Game the System
14.plot: Brooke and Kevin test the most effective hacks for buying a used car, and the newest Hack Master reveals a mind-blowing technique for taking out the trash.

15.title: Dr. Hack Is Back
15.plot: Dr. Hack is back with tips for treating medical maladies. Plus, Broke Ass Bob hacks moving in together, Kevin tests a homemade tanning blend, and Brooke reveals the Lazy Cook's latest endeavor: homemade microwaved potato chips.

16.title: From Free Parking to Peeling Eggs
16.plot: From Free Parking to Peeling Eggs: Brooke and Kevin take gaming the system to new heights as they test the best social hacks for getting free parking. Plus, Kevin enlists the help of three chefs to find the best hack for peeling eggs, Brooke uncovers the secret to reversing shrinking sweaters, and Pitch Man shares the best hacks for cooking like a pro without needing any fancy appliances.

17.title: The Secret to Hacking
17.plot: Brooke and Kevin test the best hacks for beating a motion detector. Plus, secrets for hacking French manicures and beach hair, keeping your dog off the lawn, and making a frittata out of leftover pizza are revealed.

18.title: The Doctor Is In
18.plot: Dr. Hack is back with the most unexpected ways to cure burns, toothaches, and migraines. Plus, Kevin and Brooke test the best hacks for maintaining rock star hair, cooking an omelet in a bag, and gaming the carnival system.

19.title: Hack Nanny Saves the Day
19.plot: Hack Nanny returns with the best parenting tips and tricks, and Broke Ass Bob figures out how to hack his own day spa. Plus, Brooke hacks homemade pizza bites, and Kevin drinks juice without taking it out of the fridge.

20.title: The Hack House
20.plot: The Hack House: Brooke and Kevin test their craziest hack yet: cooking a three-course meal under the hood of a car...while driving! Plus, Kevin finds out who can spot his fresh breath hack, and one family spends three months living in a Hack House.

21.title: Brooke & Kevin's Hack-Stravaganza

1.title: Hacky Holidays
1.plot: Officers Mack and Jack find the missing link for busted holiday lights when they find an unexpected visitor; hacks to navigate any holiday office party; looking at how the ball drop became a New Year's tradition.

2.title: Good Guys Finish First
2.plot: Skip a trip to the spa with a facial hack you can find in any schoolkid's book bag and learn how to treat yourself like it's your birthday, any day of the year. Plus, Brooke and Kevin go for a swim, in a garbage bag.

4.title: Hacks to Set the Mood
4.plot: Officers Mack and Jack crash a failed football-viewing party, Kevin and Brooke use an important hacker's tool to secure a restaurant reservation, and it's mom versus dad in a race to determine peanut butter & jelly supremacy.

5.title: No Reservation Required
5.plot: Officers Mack and Jack crash a failed football-viewing party, Kevin and Brooke use an important hacker's tool to secure a restaurant reservation, and it's mom versus dad in a race to determine peanut butter & jelly supremacy.

6.title: Fill Er Up
6.plot: Brooke and Kevin demonstrate how to save money at the gas tank, and the Lazy Cook shows us a great way to get more bacon out of our BLTs. Plus, breaking up doesn't have to be so hard when you use these lessons from our Hack Hero!

7.title: Jump the Line
7.plot: Brooke and Kevin give tips on skipping a busy lunch line with a new Gaming the System hack, the Pitchman has some money-saving advice for your car, and ever wonder where high heels come from? Find out in Hacks From History.

8.title: Hack to the Future
8.plot: We're going to the future with Kevin as he lives out his hoverboard dream with Master Hacker Science Bob. And move over, 2000 thread count sheets, Brooke and Kevin spot a hack that will help your sheets feel like a million bucks!

9.title: Hack-a-Bye Baby
9.plot: Officers Mack and Jack come to the rescue of a perp who has a tough time being alone, and Kevin reunites with his long-time friend Candace Bailey in a hacksperiment where they attempt to find out the sex of her baby.

10.title: To Tell a Lie
10.plot: Brooke and Kevin meet their toughest challenge yet when they use hacks to game a polygraph test, and it gets hot and heavy in the OR when Dr. Hack meets the fiery new CEO. Plus, Kevin learns how to defend himself with a smartphone.

11.title: Awww Craps!
11.plot: Brooke and Kevin meet their toughest challenge yet when they use hacks to game a polygraph test, and it gets hot and heavy in the OR when Dr. Hack meets the fiery new CEO. Plus, Kevin learns how to defend himself with a smartphone.

12.title: Light Up Your Life
12.plot: Brooke and Kevin explore hacks that could save money on your cable bill, and Hack Master Kosta Grammatis helps Kevin fulfill his childhood laser-blast dreams. Plus, find out how a hack helped get the world into a sticky situation.

15.title: Co-Hackitation
15.plot: Brooke meets a dominatrix who wants to teach a pomegranate a lesson, and Mack and Jack try to help a new couple beat the cohabitation curse. Plus, Kevin and Brooke test a hack that puts your baby to work.

16.title: Saved by the Hack
16.plot: Have Kevin and Brooke finally found the hacked pool of their dreams in "Hack or Wack"? And in "Hack Line of Defense," rude teenagers will no longer spoil the mood, thanks to hacks that will keep them on the straight and narrow.

17.title: Keep on Hacking
17.plot: Kevin and Brooke go dumpster-diving at the drive-thru in "Gaming the System," and Kevin is the hack hunter, as he meets with truckers to find some new everyday hacks. Plus, Se?or Soluci?n has a nasty fall on "Hacks Del Coraz?n."

18.title: Good Hack Hunting
18.plot: Kevin and Brooke test hacks for fighting the urge to sprinkle a little tinkle. Plus, which host will be the victor for road trip hacks? And Nurse Hackie has the cure for itchy bites, if she can stay sober long enough to find it.

19.title: Hack Paper Scissors
19.plot: Kevin and Brooke find out that poo on the shoe isn't good luck, and Brooke tests some hacks for her pup. Plus, learn some hacks to go undercover when the Cold-Blooded Hacker tries to swipe some bling.

20.title: Hack on a Hot Tin Roof
20.plot: Kevin and Brooke test your hacks for smelly kitty litter, Kevin makes a flute out of a carrot in a new segment of Let's Make a Thing, and our Hack Line of Defense will have a testy bridezilla walking down the aisle in no time.

21.title: Hack My Lawn
21.plot: Kevin and Brooke bring back a failed lawnmower hack, but will it work this time? Plus, Kevin tests cheese cutting hacks for your next charcuterie, and there's been a murder, murder mystery that is. Fortunately, Hack 911 is on the case.

22.title: Mother Hacker
22.plot: Brooke and Kevin test out a new toilet hack that will have you seeing in the dark, and Brooke has tips for hacking your dating profile. Plus, it's the shock of the season when Señor Soluciun finally meets his match, his mother-in-law.

1.title: The Hack's Out the Bag
1.plot: Kevin and Brooke battle for the best kitten hacks and test user-submitted hacks to bring dead batteries back to life. Plus, Brooke hacks a pizza in a waffle iron, and find out how the cheeseburger became a Hack from History.

imdb.title: Hack My Life
plot: Taking everyday items and using them to make your life easier.
